ur_rna.StructureEditor.services.drawing.export

Class SvgGraphicsExporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • ur_rna.StructureEditor.services.drawing.export.SvgGraphicsExporter

  • public class SvgGraphicsExporter
extends java.lang.Object
    Saves Graphics operations (recorded by a Graphics2DRecorder) to SVG format.
